T02D3279:27a-1: badzra dzv'a la aa na l'a rka s'a dha am /
T02D3279:27a-3: rdo rje me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3279:27a-4: de kho na bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D3279:27a-5: thogs la nyi ma la yi ge h'um thing nag
T02D3279:27a-6: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje me 'bar ba'i
T02D3279:27a-7: gzi brjid sku mdog mthing nag /
T02D3279:27a-8: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas dkrigs pa'i 'od zer can /
T02D3279:27a-9: zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa ste /
T02D3279:27a-13: thugs rje'i ro dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi'o //
T02D3279:27a-14: g-yas pa'i phyag bzhis ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
T02D3279:27a-15: g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi na ni dril bu dang /
T02D3279:27a-19: bsgril nas rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan bsnams pa'o //
T02D3279:27a-20: dbu skra ser po'i thor tshugs kyi me dpung 'bar bar gyur pa /
T02D3279:27a-21: shin tu 'jigs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur pa'i dpung rgyan dang /
T02D3279:27a-28: dbu rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3279:27a-32: tsa tu ram khyim thab dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug
T02D3279:27a-33: g-yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis mnan nas legs par gnas
T02D3279:27a-34: par bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02D3279:27a-35: de nas ni phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3279:27a-36: lag mthil rdo rje bcings la sor mo rnams 'bar
T02D3279:27a-37: ba'i snying por dbus su mthe bong gnyis mthor byas
T02D3279:27a-38: te / sngags bzla bar bya ba'o //
T02D3279:27a-39: aom badzra dzv'a l'a na l'a rka h'um bya ba'o //
T02D3279:27a-40: rdo rje 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs so /
